prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Synth Pad, Bass, Organ, but without Guitar.
captions:
1. This piece of music is composed of Drums, Synth Pad, Bass, and Organ, but no Guitar.
2. No Guitar is included in this song, but it does feature Drums, Synth Pad, Bass, and Organ.
3. This song is made up of Drums, Synth Pad, Bass, and Organ - no Guitar is present.
